resources.string: To enter the readings click on the specific circle button on the specific time , for entering the morning readings click on the cirlce button belonging to the morning button , Follow the same rule for entering the other readings. Once entered the button will turn green and show your readings. You can only change your Readings only on that particular day you can not change any readings other than the present day.
How many times should we Test the Sugar levels?

It would be great to test the blood sugar levels 4 times a day that is 2 hrs before breakfast in the morning then the second measurement 2 hrs after breakfast. The third measurement at the evening before having dinner and the last measurement before sleeping. However the first two readings of the day will also suffice .
